name: MONSTER (monster.wad)
description: A huge, fairly straight foreward level that is is my first attempt at designing a new wad. I do not have any real story behind designing this wad. However, you should be able to complete this wad without the use of any "special commands". The reason I started building this is because I have played most of the other wads out there, and I thought I go do a better job. Boy was I wrong. Building a good wad, takes time and patience. Neither of which I possess alot of. Happy Hunting.
